sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Provider :mapDispatchToProps="itemsMapStateToProps" :mapStateToProps="itemsMapDispatchToProps" :store="itemsStore">
    <template slot-scope="{itemsArray, actions}">
      <Dashboard :itemsArray="itemsArray" :actions="actions" :title="title" />
    </template>
  </Provider>
</template>

<script>
import {createStore, bindActionCreators} from 'redux'
import Provider from 'vuejs-redux'
import * as Actions from '../actions'
import Dashboard from "../../views/Dashboard"
import {itemsReducer} from '../reducers/ItemsReducer'

export default {
  methods: {
    itemsMapStateToProps(state) {
      return {itemsArray: state}
    },

    itemsMapDispatchToProps(dispatch) {
      return {actions: bindActionCreators(Actions, dispatch)}
    },
  },

  components: {
    App,
    Provider,
  },

  data: () => ({
    itemsStore: createStore(itemsReducer),
    title: 'App Provider',
  }),
}
</script>
